## Product Focus

The American Gold Buffalo is:
- 24-karat gold (.9999 fine purity)
- 1 troy ounce of pure gold
- U.S. legal tender with $50 face value
- First minted in 2006
- IRA-eligible
- Features James Earle Fraser's Buffalo Nickel design
